document_data.name: Dragonblood Spell-pact
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragonblood spell-pact''''' was a spell that was used by [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed two dragons or draconic creature to trade a known spell. While the spells that are to be traded must be of the same level, they did not have to be in the same [[schools of magic|school]]. A caster could not use this spell to learn more spells then permitted by their skill level and once a spell was traded, it must be re-learned. This spell could only be cast by dragons or other draconic creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]]. Each caster had to partake in a blood ceremony, with the drawn blood to be used as the material component.
